text:
Gigi Hadid has come up with many stellar skinny-jean outfits over the years and started plenty of trends in the process, so we're always eager to see what she's going to put together next. And this week in New York, she didn't disappoint. Hadid's light-wash Frame jeans and white T-shirt, which she paired with an $89 Storets jacket in bright pink, certainly made for a fun summer skinny-jean outfit, but it was the small detail on her feet that really gave us something to talk about.

You may have noticed that It girls like Selena Gomez and Kaia Gerber have been embracing a super-cheap trend as of late: crew socks. And now, Hadid is stepping on board. She wore her athletic socks with a pair of clunky white dad sneakers (by Naked Wolfe) that she's grown fond of lately. It's a bit unexpected to wear high socks with cropped skinny jeans, and that's what we like about it. We also don't hate the idea of wearing them with other shoe styles, like pool slides and loafers, if you dare. It's safe to say that Gigi would indeed dare.

Shop the super-cheap crew sock trend that Hadid is wearing with skinny jeans below, and check out other celebs who have recently worn the trend.
title: Gigi Hadid Wore This Super-Cheap Trend With Skinny Jeans
